typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	foldernamedf as string,
	filenamedf as string
}
source(output(
		Make as string,
		Model as string,
		Type as string,
		Origin as string,
		DriveTrain as string,
		Length as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: [(concat($foldernamedf,'/', $filenamedf)),'outputs/inputs2']) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
